text: Sahrab khea mi ma la xik ahˌ phu fea tidtam thang khang hna læa khang hlang khea raksʹa khea tamph ra baycha khx ngxallxhˌ thæ cring xallxhˌ ca mi thrng peliynpælng sphaph khxng chnk lum dı cnkwa phwk khea ca peliynpælng sphaph khxng phwk khea xeng læa meux xallxhˌ thrng prarthna khwam thukkh kæ chnk lum dı k ca mimi phu txbto phraxngkh læa sahrab phwk khea mimi phu chwyhelux nxkcak phraxngkh
